Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Spgly-AMP (S. paramamosain Gly-rich AMP; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 1S=S; UCSS1 )

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (52.6%) toCrustacean GRPSp. GRAVY: -0.38; Mol Formula: C187H278N51O46S2; Mol Wt: 4050.684; mol ex coeff: 18265.Activity: Active against S. aureus, B. subtilis  (MIC 12 uM), E. coli (50% inhibition at 12 uM), V. parahaemolyticus (MIC ~48 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Xie Y, Wan H, Zeng X, Zhang Z, Wang Y.2020
Literature Information.Title: Characterization and antimicrobial evaluation of a new Spgly-AMP, glycine-rich antimicrobial peptide from the mud crab Scylla paramamosain
